00033 B3_ATTRIBUTE_ALIGNED16(class) b3Transform {
00034         
00036         b3Matrix3x3 m_basis;
00038         b3Vector3   m_origin;
00039 
00040 public:
00041         
00043         b3Transform() {}
00047         explicit B3_FORCE_INLINE b3Transform(const b3Quaternion& q, 
00048                 const b3Vector3& c = b3MakeVector3(b3Scalar(0), b3Scalar(0), b3Scalar(0))) 
00049                 : m_basis(q),
00050                 m_origin(c)
00051         {}
00052 
00056         explicit B3_FORCE_INLINE b3Transform(const b3Matrix3x3& b, 
00057                 const b3Vector3& c = b3MakeVector3(b3Scalar(0), b3Scalar(0), b3Scalar(0)))
00058                 : m_basis(b),
00059                 m_origin(c)
00060         {}
00062         B3_FORCE_INLINE b3Transform (const b3Transform& other)
00063                 : m_basis(other.m_basis),
00064                 m_origin(other.m_origin)
00065         {
00066         }
00068         B3_FORCE_INLINE b3Transform& operator=(const b3Transform& other)
00069         {
00070                 m_basis = other.m_basis;
00071                 m_origin = other.m_origin;
00072                 return *this;
00073         }
00074 
00075 
00080                 B3_FORCE_INLINE void mult(const b3Transform& t1, const b3Transform& t2) {
00081                         m_basis = t1.m_basis * t2.m_basis;
00082                         m_origin = t1(t2.m_origin);
00083                 }
00084 
00085 /*              void multInverseLeft(const b3Transform& t1, const b3Transform& t2) {
00086                         b3Vector3 v = t2.m_origin - t1.m_origin;
00087                         m_basis = b3MultTransposeLeft(t1.m_basis, t2.m_basis);
00088                         m_origin = v * t1.m_basis;
00089                 }
00090                 */
00091 
00093         B3_FORCE_INLINE b3Vector3 operator()(const b3Vector3& x) const
00094         {
00095         return x.dot3(m_basis[0], m_basis[1], m_basis[2]) + m_origin;
00096         }
00097 
00099         B3_FORCE_INLINE b3Vector3 operator*(const b3Vector3& x) const
00100         {
00101                 return (*this)(x);
00102         }
00103 
00105         B3_FORCE_INLINE b3Quaternion operator*(const b3Quaternion& q) const
00106         {
00107                 return getRotation() * q;
00108         }
00109 
00111         B3_FORCE_INLINE b3Matrix3x3&       getBasis()          { return m_basis; }
00113         B3_FORCE_INLINE const b3Matrix3x3& getBasis()    const { return m_basis; }
00114 
00116         B3_FORCE_INLINE b3Vector3&         getOrigin()         { return m_origin; }
00118         B3_FORCE_INLINE const b3Vector3&   getOrigin()   const { return m_origin; }
00119 
00121         b3Quaternion getRotation() const { 
00122                 b3Quaternion q;
00123                 m_basis.getRotation(q);
00124                 return q;
00125         }
00126         
00127         
00130         void setFromOpenGLMatrix(const b3Scalar *m)
00131         {
00132                 m_basis.setFromOpenGLSubMatrix(m);
00133                 m_origin.setValue(m[12],m[13],m[14]);
00134         }
00135 
00138         void getOpenGLMatrix(b3Scalar *m) const 
00139         {
00140                 m_basis.getOpenGLSubMatrix(m);
00141                 m[12] = m_origin.getX();
00142                 m[13] = m_origin.getY();
00143                 m[14] = m_origin.getZ();
00144                 m[15] = b3Scalar(1.0);
00145         }
00146 
00149         B3_FORCE_INLINE void setOrigin(const b3Vector3& origin) 
00150         { 
00151                 m_origin = origin;
00152         }
00153 
00154         B3_FORCE_INLINE b3Vector3 invXform(const b3Vector3& inVec) const;
00155 
00156 
00158         B3_FORCE_INLINE void setBasis(const b3Matrix3x3& basis)
00159         { 
00160                 m_basis = basis;
00161         }
00162 
00164         B3_FORCE_INLINE void setRotation(const b3Quaternion& q)
00165         {
00166                 m_basis.setRotation(q);
00167         }
00168 
00169 
00171         void setIdentity()
00172         {
00173                 m_basis.setIdentity();
00174                 m_origin.setValue(b3Scalar(0.0), b3Scalar(0.0), b3Scalar(0.0));
00175         }
00176 
00179         b3Transform& operator*=(const b3Transform& t) 
00180         {
00181                 m_origin += m_basis * t.m_origin;
00182                 m_basis *= t.m_basis;
00183                 return *this;
00184         }
00185 
00187         b3Transform inverse() const
00188         { 
00189                 b3Matrix3x3 inv = m_basis.transpose();
00190                 return b3Transform(inv, inv * -m_origin);
00191         }
00192 
00196         b3Transform inverseTimes(const b3Transform& t) const;  
00197 
00199         b3Transform operator*(const b3Transform& t) const;
00200 
00202         static const b3Transform&       getIdentity()
00203         {
00204                 static const b3Transform identityTransform(b3Matrix3x3::getIdentity());
00205                 return identityTransform;
00206         }
00207 
00208         void    serialize(struct        b3TransformData& dataOut) const;
00209 
00210         void    serializeFloat(struct   b3TransformFloatData& dataOut) const;
00211 
00212         void    deSerialize(const struct        b3TransformData& dataIn);
00213 
00214         void    deSerializeDouble(const struct  b3TransformDoubleData& dataIn);
00215 
00216         void    deSerializeFloat(const struct   b3TransformFloatData& dataIn);
00217 
00218 };

00221 B3_FORCE_INLINE b3Vector3
00222 b3Transform::invXform(const b3Vector3& inVec) const
00223 {
00224         b3Vector3 v = inVec - m_origin;
00225         return (m_basis.transpose() * v);
00226 }
00227 
00228 B3_FORCE_INLINE b3Transform 
00229 b3Transform::inverseTimes(const b3Transform& t) const  
00230 {
00231         b3Vector3 v = t.getOrigin() - m_origin;
00232                 return b3Transform(m_basis.transposeTimes(t.m_basis),
00233                         v * m_basis);
00234 }
00235 
00236 B3_FORCE_INLINE b3Transform 
00237 b3Transform::operator*(const b3Transform& t) const
00238 {
00239         return b3Transform(m_basis * t.m_basis, 
00240                 (*this)(t.m_origin));
00241 }
00242 
00244 B3_FORCE_INLINE bool operator==(const b3Transform& t1, const b3Transform& t2)
00245 {
00246    return ( t1.getBasis()  == t2.getBasis() &&
00247             t1.getOrigin() == t2.getOrigin() );
00248 }

00280 {
